titles: The lovesick maid of Waping her complaint for want of apple-pye. This maid was in such deep distress, wanting a gamesome lad, she cry'd for want of happiness that other lovers had. Tune of, Jenny Gin, fair one let me in, Busie fame, Hey boys up go-we.
notes: Verse: "You that enjoy your hearts delight ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
